description.value: Your qi, dancing ever diligently toward cultivation, eludes the grasp of the world's muck and mire. When you cast your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Adapt Self] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Athletic Rush] focus spells, you ignore difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.
